text: Beast Boy (Garfield "Gar" Logan) is a fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. He was created by writer Arnold Drake and artist Bob Brown. The character first appeared in The Doom Patrol #99 (November 1965). He is a known member of the Teen Titans. == Fictional character biography == He is a shapeshifter (changes his body form) to any animal he chooses. == In other media == Beast Boy has appeared in many cartoon television shows and movies, including as one of the Teen Titans in Cartoon Network's eponymous series, voiced by Greg Cipes and appeared on Titans, played by Ryan Potter. Beast Boy also appears in Teen Titans Go! ==Other websites== * Titans Tower: Beast Boy * DC Comics official origin page for Beast Boy. * Top 10 Alternate Versions Of Beast Boy. title: Beast Boy
